page.title: 18RELIGION IN S.NORMANTON
page.content: The population in Pinxton and South Normanton is 11,507.Our survey was taken from 134 children in Pinxton and 339 in South Normanton.Pinxton has St Helens as its parish church and 2 Methodist churches,one at each end of the village.South Normanton has St Michaels as its parish church and 2 Methodist churches and an Assembly of God church. 63 children went to Sunday school most weeks but 105 had never been to a service in any church.More than 50% of children had been baptised but the largest number of children had attended a church for a marriage service. We found a slightly higher proportion of people went to church or chapel in South Normanton.But owing to the geography of the village it was possible to live further away from a place of worship than in Pinxton.
